virality_potential.justification: Engages Web3 gaming community with event promotion and incentives. Includes multiple hashtags and visual elements that encourage sharing.

sentiment_polarity.justification: Positive tone with celebratory emojis (üåüüî•) and emphasis on prize/honor.

virality_potential.justification: Job posting has limited viral appeal despite RT request. Targets specific professional audience rather than general crypto community.

virality_potential.justification: Technical claims about blockchain trilemma solution may generate discussion in crypto circles, though niche focus limits broader appeal.

duration_of_impact.justification: Fundamental technical claims could remain reference points in blockchain discussions long-term.

virality_potential.justification: Giveaway incentive could drive limited sharing, but small ETH requirement creates participation barrier.

virality_potential.justification: Spanish-language educational resource has limited reach beyond specific learner groups, despite enthusiastic presentation.

virality_potential.justification: Italian-language crypto investment news has niche appeal, though teaser format ('Ha per√≤...') may drive some clicks.

virality_potential.justification: Technical chart analysis clarification has limited appeal beyond crypto analytics enthusiasts.

virality_potential.justification: Philosophical discussion about blockchain governance has very niche appeal and abstract premise.
